task.title: Moving a View
task.shortdesc: Move a view to a different position in the workspace to take best advantage of the available space.

taskbody.prereq: Your user ID must have Workspace Author Mode permission to use this function.

context.p: You can easily rearrange the views in a workspace to take advantage of the greater width available below the Navigator view and the narrow area to the right.

step.cmd: Move the mouse pointer over the title bar of the view you want to relocate.
Click and drag the view over the space you want it to occupy. While dragging the title bar, you should see a semi-transparent copy of the view.
Release the mouse button to swap the views.
